name: arrayNew
description: Creates an array of 1-3 dimensions. Index array elements with square brackets: [ ]. CFML arrays expand dynamically as data is added.

params.name: isSynchronized
params.description: CF2016+ Lucee5.1+ When true creates a synchronized array. Unsynchronized arrays are not thread safe so they should not be used within shared scopes (application, session, etc). According to the CF2016 Performance whitepaper: Unsynchronized arrays are about 93% faster due to lock avoidance.

links.title: Adobe CF2016 Performance Whitepaper
links.description: According to this document: Unsynchronized arrays are about 93% faster due to lock avoidance
